com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.test
Class TestMonitor

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.test.TestMonitor

public class TestMonitor
extends java.lang.Object

This file contains the definition of the test monitor. It can be setup to monitor a test such as the loading of a test jar.

Method Summary
 void alert(java.lang.String element)
          This method alerts the monitoring thread to the fact that it is complete.
static TestMonitor getInstance()
          This method returns an instance of the test monitor object.
static void init()
          This method is responsible for initializing the test monitor singleton.
 void monitor()
          This method will be called to monitor the test to determine if the test was successfull.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
